mapper.select: select count(*) from ( select nvl(to_char(usedate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),-99) AS usedate from mycoupon where fk_userid = #{userid} ) where usedate like '%'||'-99'||'%'
select count(*) from ( select nvl(to_char(usedate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),-99) AS usedate from mycoupon where fk_userid = #{userid} ) where not usedate = '-99'

select rnum, mycp_idx,cpcode,cpname,cpexpire,dcmoney,userid,usedate from ( select rownum AS rnum, mycp_idx,fk_cpcode AS cpcode,cpname,cpexpire,dcmoney,fk_userid as userid,usedate from ( select mycp_idx,fk_cpcode,cpname,cpexpire,dcmoney,fk_userid,nvl(to_char(usedate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),-9999) AS usedate from myCoupon A join coupon B on A.fk_cpcode = B.cpcode where fk_userid= #{userid} order by cpexpire )V where usedate = '-9999' )F where rnum between #{startRno} and #{endRno}

select rnum,cpcode,cpname,cpexpire,dcmoney,usedate from ( select rownum AS rnum, mycp_idx,fk_cpcode AS cpcode,cpname,cpexpire,dcmoney,fk_userid,usedate from ( select mycp_idx,fk_cpcode,cpname,cpexpire,dcmoney,fk_userid,nvl(to_char(usedate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),-9999) AS usedate from myCoupon A join coupon B on A.fk_cpcode = B.cpcode where fk_userid= #{userid} order by cpexpire )V where not usedate = '-9999' )F where rnum between #{startRno} and #{endRno}

select userid,username,pwd,email,phone,post,addr,detailaddr ,gender,to_char(birthday,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS birthday,introduction,memberstatus,profileimg,warncount,regdate from member where memberstatus =1 and userid = #{loginuser}
select count(*) from review A join room B on A.fk_roomcode = B.roomcode where B.fk_userid=#{userid}

select B.rsvcode ,A.userid AS userid, username, email, phone, C.roomcode AS roomcode, to_char(rsv_checkindate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as rsv_checkindate, substr(rsv_checkindate,7,2) AS checkInDD, substr(rsv_checkindate,0,2) AS checkInYY, substr(rsv_checkindate,4,2) AS checkInMM, substr(rsv_checkoutdate,7,2) AS checkOutDD, substr(rsv_checkoutdate,0,2) AS checkOutYY, substr(rsv_checkoutdate,4,2) AS checkOutMM, to_char(rsv_checkindate, 'DAY' ) AS checkInDay, to_char(rsv_checkoutdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as rsv_checkoutdate, to_char(rsv_checkoutdate, 'DAY' ) AS checkOutDay, to_char(paydate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as paydate, to_char(rsv_cancledate,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS rsv_cancledate ,roomname ,roommainimg, roomtel ,roompost, roomsigungu, roomsido, roombname,roomdetailaddr,latitude,longitude ,case when rsv_checkindate > sysdate then 1 else 2 end AS flag ,(to_date(rsv_checkoutdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') - to_date(rsv_checkindate,'yyyy-mm-dd')) AS dat from member A right join reservation B on A.userid = B.fk_userid join room C on B.fk_roomcode = C.roomcode left join roomtype D on C.fk_roomtype_idx = D.roomtype_idx left join BUILDTYPE_DETAIL E on C.fk_buildType_detail_idx = e.buildtype_detail_idx left join BUILDTYPE F on F.BUILDTYPE_IDX = E.FK_BUILDTYPE_IDX where A.userid = #{loginuser}

select A.userid AS userid, username, email, phone, B.rsvcode AS rsvcode, C.roomcode AS roomcode ,basic_person, guestcount ,babycount,rsv_name,rsv_phone,rsv_email, to_char(rsv_checkindate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as rsv_checkindate, substr(rsv_checkindate,7,2) AS checkInDD, substr(rsv_checkindate,0,2) AS checkInYY, substr(rsv_checkindate,4,2) AS checkInMM, substr(rsv_checkoutdate,7,2) AS checkOutDD, substr(rsv_checkoutdate,0,2) AS checkOutYY, substr(rsv_checkoutdate,4,2) AS checkOutMM, to_char(rsv_checkindate, 'DAY' ) AS checkInDay, to_char(rsv_checkoutdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as rsv_checkoutdate, to_char(rsv_checkoutdate, 'DAY' ) AS checkOutDay, to_char(paydate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as paydate, to_char(rsv_cancledate,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS rsv_cancledate ,totalprice, dcprice, cleanpay,roomprice,roomprice*0.1 AS servicePrice, fk_roomtype_idx,roomname ,roommainimg, roomtel ,roompost, roomsigungu, roomsido, roombname,roomdetailaddr,latitude,longitude ,rsv_msg,roomcount,bathcount ,roomtype_name ,case when rsv_checkindate > sysdate then 1 else 2 end AS flag ,(to_date(rsv_checkoutdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') - to_date(rsv_checkindate,'yyyy-mm-dd')) AS dat ,trunc(rsv_checkindate - sysdate) as daysRemaining from member A join reservation B on A.userid = B.fk_userid join room C on B.fk_roomcode = C.roomcode left join roomtype D on C.fk_roomtype_idx = D.roomtype_idx where A.userid = #{userid} and rsvcode= #{rsvcode}

select A.rsvcode,A.fk_roomcode,A.fk_userid,latitude,longitude,roomname,roomsido,roomsigungu,roombname from reservation A join room B on A.fk_roomcode = B.roomcode where A.rsvcode like #{rsvcode} and A.fk_userid like #{userid}

select A.review_idx,B.roomname,B.roomcode,B.fk_userid AS host_userid,A.correct, A.communicate,A.clean,A.position,A.checkin,A.value ,A.review_content,A.hostanswer,to_char(A.review_writedate,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS review_writedate
from review A join room B on B.roomcode = A.fk_roomcode where A.fk_userid = #{userid} order by review_idx desc

select rnum,review_idx,roomname,roomcode,host_userid,write_userid,correct,communicate,clean,position,checkin,value ,review_content,hostanswer,review_writedate,AVG from ( select rownum AS rnum,review_idx,roomname,roomcode,host_userid,write_userid,correct,communicate,clean,position,checkin,value ,review_content,hostanswer,review_writedate,AVG from ( select A.review_idx,B.roomname,B.roomcode,A.fk_userid AS write_userid,B.fk_userid AS host_userid,A.correct, A.communicate,A.clean,A.position,A.checkin,A.value ,A.review_content,A.hostanswer,to_char(A.review_writedate,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS review_writedate , trunc((correct+communicate+clean+position+checkin+value)/6,1) as AVG from review A join room B on B.roomcode = A.fk_roomcode order by review_idx desc )V where host_userid = #{userid} ) where rnum between #{startRno} and #{endRno} order by rnum asc
mapper.update: update member set email=#{email}, phone=#{phone}, post=#{post}, addr= #{addr}, detailaddr=#{detailAddr}, introduction=#{introduction}, profileimg=#{profileimg} where userid=#{userid}
mapper.select: select rsvcode,V.fk_userid,rsv_checkindate,rsv_checkoutdate,roomname,B.roomcode,rsv_cancledate from ( select rsvcode,fk_userid,to_char(rsv_checkindate,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS rsv_checkindate,to_char(rsv_checkoutdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS rsv_checkoutdate,fk_roomcode, nvl(to_char(rsv_cancledate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),-9999) AS rsv_cancledate from reservation where fk_userid = #{userid} and not fk_roomcode in (select fk_roomcode from review where fk_userid=#{userid}) )V left join room B on V.fk_roomcode = B.roomcode where rsv_cancledate = '-9999' order by rsvcode desc
mapper.update: update reservation set rsv_cancledate = sysdate where fk_userid = #{userid} and rsvcode = #{rsvcode}
mapper.select: select buildtype_detail_name,buildtype from BUILDTYPE_DETAIL A join BUILDTYPE B on B.BUILDTYPE_IDX = A.FK_BUILDTYPE_IDX right join room C on C.FK_BUILDTYPE_DETAIL_IDX = A.BUILDTYPE_DETAIL_IDX where roomcode = #{roomcode}

select rsvcode,rsv_name,fk_roomcode,rsv_email,rsv_cancledate,fk_userid,flag ,rsv_checkindate from ( select rsvcode,rsv_name,fk_roomcode,rsv_email,rsv_cancledate,fk_userid,case when flag = 5 then 1 else 0 end AS flag ,rsv_checkindate from ( select rsvcode,rsv_name,rsv_email,fk_roomcode,nvl(to_char(rsv_cancledate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),-9999) AS rsv_cancledate,fk_userid,trunc(to_date(rsv_checkindate)-sysdate) AS flag ,rsv_checkindate from reservation )where rsv_cancledate = '-9999' ) where flag = 1
